text: Samern is a community in the County of Bentheim in Lower Saxony, Germany. ==Geography== ===Place=== Samern is between Nordhorn and Steinfurt on the boundary with North Rhine-Westphalia. The community belongs to the Joint Community (Samtgemeinde) of Schüttorf whose administrative seat is in the like-named town. ==References== ==Other websites== *Samern *Joint Community’s website Category:County of Bentheim (district)
title: Samern
